AFTER:
x = input
        stacked = []
        output = []

        stacked.append(input)

        for idx in range(self.depth):
            if idx != 0:
                x = torch.cat(stacked, dim=1)
            x = self.net[idx](x)
            stacked.append(x)
        
        output = torch.cat(stacked[1:], dim=1)
